Tyrael: Easy, lady. I am Tirpredacus, not a Predacon. I respect my 
word. (He turns to Hydras) Agree... Let's call a break for now. 
Tipredacus! Stand down!

Dreadplague was about to cut Perceptor, but broke her momentum. She 
kept her sword close, however.

Tyrael: Well, Hydras, time to calm your people, then I'll tell you 
what I have in mind.

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Hydras:
> 
> Hydras laughted "How sweet she is, isn't she???? Well, Tylrael, we 
> could get and agreemet, just if the points that you mentioned 
aren't 
> very unpleasant.. but before what if we tell to our soldiers that 
we 
> have a break?? "
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> > Maxima made her way to the entrance. Leaning against it as it 
> opened, 
> > watching Tyrael & Hydras. 
> > 
> > She growled. "A deal now & back stab later?" 
> > 
> > Glaring at Tyrael, "You do anything treacherous, Tyrael. I will 
> PERSONALLY 
> > have your lasercore!" hissing as she bit the words out.
